## Abac class

Abstract class to implements Abac control Initialize as data sources to have context

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare abstract class Abac 
```

## Example


```
class MyAbac extends Abac {
  protected policies = [ EntityPolicy ];
}
```
Then into index.ts

```
dataSources: () => ({
  abac: new MyAbac()
})
```
To use it:

```
const { dataSources: { Abac } } = context;
Abac.EntityPolicy.create(input);
Abac.EntityPolicy.delete(input);
Abac.EntityPolicy.read(doc);
Abac.EntityPolicy.update(input);
```

|  [policies](./subito-graphql.abac.policies.md) | <code>protected</code> | {} |  |
